definition: brothers/comrades/men/brethren
variant of 悌[ti4]
younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)
elder brother
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals

sentences.english: Then Joseph said to his brothers, "Come close to me."
sentences.chinese: 這風聲傳到法老的宮裏，說，約瑟的弟兄們來了。

sentences.english: So Jephthah fled from his brothers and dwelt in the land of Tob .
sentences.chinese: 耶弗他就逃離他的弟兄們，去住在陀伯地。

sentences.english: Jn. 3:13 Do not marvel, brothers, if the world hates you.
sentences.chinese: 約壹三13弟兄們，世人若恨你們，不要以爲希奇。

sentences.english: 10As soon as it was night, the brothers sent Paul and Silas away to Berea.
sentences.chinese: 弟兄們，隨既在夜間打發保羅和西拉往庇哩亞去。

sentences.english: Marvel not, my brethren, if the world hate you.
sentences.chinese: 弟兄們，世人若恨你們，不要以爲希奇。

sentences.english: But ye, brethren, be not weary in well doing.
sentences.chinese: 弟兄們，你們行善不可喪志。

sentences.english: Now concerning spiritual [gifts], brethren, I would not have you ignorant.
sentences.chinese: 弟兄們，論到屬靈的恩賜，我不願意你們不明白。

sentences.english: But Paul choosing Silas, departed, being delivered by the brethren to the grace of God.
sentences.chinese: 保祿卻揀選了息拉，蒙弟兄們將他託於主的恩寵以後。

sentences.english: 30When the brothers learned of this, they took him down to Caesarea and sent him off to Tarsus.
sentences.chinese: 弟兄們知道了，就送他下該撒利亞，打發他往大數去。

sentences.english: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit, brothers.
sentences.chinese: 弟兄們，願我主耶穌基督的恩常在你們心裏。

sentences.english: Brethren, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ [be] with your spirit.
sentences.chinese: 弟兄們，願我主耶穌基督的恩常在你們心裏。

sentences.english: for the brothers, when they came from Macedonia, supplied the measureof my need.
sentences.chinese: 因我所缺乏的，那從馬其頓來的弟兄們都補足了。

sentences.english: And I, brethren, if I yet preach circumcision, why do I yet suffer persecution?
sentences.chinese: 弟兄們，我若仍舊傳割禮，爲什麼還受逼迫呢。

sentences.english: The men were still sprawled on the rock resting quiet.
sentences.chinese: 弟兄們都還攤手攤腳地躺在岩石上，靜靜養神。

sentences.english: Brethren, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit.
sentences.chinese: 弟兄們，願我主耶穌基督的恩常在你們心裏。

definition: lit. single spear and horse (idiom); fig. single-handed/unaccompanied
to stand guard/to serve on sentry duty
to admonish subordinates
guard home, defend the country (idiom); national defense
to watch with folded arms (idiom); to look on without lifting a finger
to throw one's life in for/to haplessly give one's life for/to sacrifice oneself torturously working for another or for a group/to pour in one's utmost effort/to shed one's last ounce of strength for
gongs and drums overture to a Chinese opera/to create a disturbance
dauntless/to summon up courage and determination/using extreme force of will
to sacrifice one's life
drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
rather die than submit (idiom)
to transmit an order
to stop/to obstruct
to boast
army provisions/rations and fodder
Tai'erzhuang district of Zaozhuang city 棗莊市|枣庄市[Zao3 zhuang1 shi4], Shandong
